name: Who?Me!
description:
Who?ME! is the perfect game for a cozy game night or as a warm up before hitting town! Get to know your friends in a whole new way. In this game knowing your friends is the way to victory!
Features - 50 questions in the free default pack! - Danish design. - Multiple packs coming! - Unlimited amount of players (however we suggest between 3-8 players). - Default pack is family friendly. - Light weight. - Works Great as a drinking game.

Rules: - Read aloud the question and then each player takes a turn to answer it. - A random answer i chosen now it’s up to the other players to guess whose answer it is! - Points are awarded to those who get it right!
Answer questions like: - What is your pet peeve? - When was the last time you burned food while cooking? - Name your self-biography? - How long would you be able to survive in the wild?

Play it for free now!
